install.name: os_paypal_express
install.title: PayPal Express
install.author: Joshua E. Vines
install.description: PayPal Express Payment Plugin for Membership Pro

field.name: paypal_mode
field.label: PayPal Mode
field.description: Set to Live or Sandbox Mode

field.name: client_id_l
field.label: Client Id (developer) (live mode)
field.description: Enter Client Id from PayPal developer account

field.name: secret_l
field.label: Secret (developer) (live mode)
field.description: Enter Secret from PayPal developer account

field.name: email_l
field.label: Merchant Email (live mode)
field.description: Enter email associated with PayPal merchant account

field.name: timeout_l
field.label: Timeout (live mode)
field.description: Enter live mode timeout in seconds

field.name: log_path_l
field.label: Path (live mode)
field.description: Enter path to store live mode PayPal log file. Can point to off-line location.

field.name: client_id_s
field.label: Client Id (developer) (sandbox mode)
field.description: Enter Client Id from PayPal developer account

field.name: secret_s
field.label: Secret (developer) (sandbox mode)
field.description: Enter Secret from PayPal developer account

field.name: email_s
field.label: Merchant Email (sandbox mode)
field.description: Enter email associated with PayPal merchant account

field.name: timeout_s
field.label: Timeout (sandbox mode)
field.description: Enter live mode timeout in seconds

field.name: log_path_s
field.label: Path (sandbox mode)
field.description: Enter path to store live mode PayPal log file. Can point to off-line location.
